message: Hi Bob, thank you for your interest in purchasing this product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm pleased to present you with an offer of $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering your evaluation.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but considering my budget and the market, I'm prepared to pay $850000. Let me know if that works for you.
Hi Bob, I understand your position and appreciate your offer. However, considering the value of the product, I would be willing to close the deal at $900000. This would provide value on both sides.
Hi Alice, thanks for your updated offer. I appreciate your flexibility. However, considering my budget, I can go up to $880000. Let me know if this works for you.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. To help us reach an agreement, I'm willing to adjust my offer slightly upward to $890000. This is still within my budget constraints and closer to your valuation. Let me know if this revised counteroffer works for you.
